title: LoLReplay crashes game of patch 5.4
body:
After I patched 5.4, the first game I played on this patch I had LoLReplay running in the background. LoLReplay has been working for over a year and has recorded some of my best moments. But today, my game couldn't open and crashed every time I press reconnect. I can't get passed that screen. Then I realised I had to uninstall LoLReplay and then after, I pressed reconnect and miraculously the game loaded. I had over 20 kills that game and I'm really sad that wasn't recorded. I saw another person post something like this a few hours ago but I want people to confirm what this is. If anybody uses LoLReplay and it worked, then I don't know whats happening. Please fix this because I want to get back recording soon!
Thank you!
Yours Kindly,
BoxBox Jnr

replies.body: This usually happens with LoLReplay when a new patch is released. Doesn't that usually mean that LoLReplay is going to release a new version to fix it?
